What Made Battlefield 3 Game a Success


In Battlefield 3, step into the shoes of the elite US Marines. You will experience heart-pounding actions whether you choose a single player or multiplayer option. The battle takes place from a variety of locations and terrains around the world. You will be taken to the streets of Tehran, Paris and New York as your combat zone.
Experience Palpitations
Get ready to meet the challenges of saving your comrades from danger in these perilous battlegrounds. The exciting missions will linger even after you have done your duty. Develop means on how to get out alive from complex war situations. The game is designed to make you think more to overcome confusion and difficulty.
Massive Destruction
You will witness massive destructions left and right in battlefield 3 game while feeling both the exhilaration and suspense at the same time. Committing a seemingly simple mistake can prove fatal to you and your comrades. You will be forced to be more deliberate and careful with every action you take to clear every stage of the game.
Intelligent Enemies
The developers have created challenging enemies with the skills that can match up with yours. If you can create tactics in your defense, they also can. They seem to be aware of what’s happening so when you think that you’re safe from where you are hiding, think again. They will also prevent you from getting too close. This is one challenge that you should never want to miss.
Unbeatable Audio Quality
Everything will seem real in this new game – the tension and anticipation disrupted by flashes of total destruction. You will see walls crumble near you, bullets whizzing by as you duck on the ground for cover. The game is more interactive as compared to the previous installments. The life-like sound effects are all made possible by Frostbite 2 Engine. You can now make battlefield 3 pre order on sites as direct2pay.
